gallery.title: Wedding Memories
gallery.noPhotosDescription: Be the first to share a memory from {{brideName}} & {{groomName}}'s special day!
gallery.enterNamePrompt: Please share your name so {{brideName}} & {{groomName}} can credit any photos you add.
gallery.photoAltTextWithGuest: Wedding photo shared by {{guestName}} - {{brideName}} & {{groomName}} wedding memories

upload.title: Share Wedding Memories
upload.description: Select files to add to {{brideName}} & {{groomName}}'s wedding gallery
upload.supportedFormatsS3: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, MP4, MOV, AVI, WebM • No size limit
upload.supportedFormatsCloudinary: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, MP4, MOV, AVI, WebM • Photos max 10MB, Videos max 100MB
upload.filesAddedToGallery: {{count}} file has been added to the wedding gallery. Use the "View Gallery" button below to see your files.
upload.filesAddedToGallery_plural: {{count}} files have been added to the wedding gallery. Use the "View Gallery" button below to see your files.

welcome.title: Welcome to our Wedding Gallery!
welcome.description: Hi! You're viewing {{brideName}} & {{groomName}}'s wedding memories. Please share your name so we can credit any photos you add.
welcome.rememberName: We'll remember your name for future visits

nameDialog.title: Change Your Name
nameDialog.description: Update the name that will be associated with your uploaded files.
nameDialog.descriptionMobile: Update the name that will be associated with your photos.

confirmDialog.removeFileDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this file from the list? This action cannot be undone.

errors.invalidFileType: {{fileName}} is not a supported format. Please select {{supportedFormats}} files.
errors.invalidFilesDescription: Some files are not supported formats. Please select valid image or video files.
errors.nameRequiredDescription: Please enter a valid name to continue.
errors.nameTooLong: Name is too long (max {{maxLength}} characters). Please use a shorter version
errors.nameNoLetters: Name must include at least one letter
errors.nameInappropriate: Please enter your actual name for the photo credits
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.fileProcessingErrorDescription: Failed to process {{fileName}}. Please try again.

success.filesSelectedDescription: {{count}} file selected and ready to upload
success.filesSelectedDescription_plural: {{count}} files selected and ready to upload
success.mediaAddedDescription: {{fileName}} has been added to the gallery.
success.welcomeDescription: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! You can now upload and view photos.
success.nameUpdatedDescription: Your name has been changed to {{name}}

video.notSupported: Video playback not supported in this browser
